name: Life run
description:
Let's play and share!

Life Run, our first game, made in two days. It will be getting updates. Try it now! Let's see how far can you get. The actual record is 1607.5 m #LifeRun #IndieGames #PizzaJam

Details:

This game inspired in the theme of Pizza JAM. "Movement"

The first step is a marble ball that roll across the toys.
In the future we hope to create more levels and reach the space.

That is the first draw about the game.

Later with more details and color:

The game still in developing, but we hope to finish with the first step in this game JAM.

^^

Gotta get that pizza!
